mapper.sql: id, pid, unitprice, pieceprice, dealer_unitprice, dealer_pieceprice, retail_unitprice, update_date, status
mapper.select: select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0 and s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
select count(*) from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id where s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and s.status=0
select count(*) from productbox_price t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0

mapper.update:
update productbox_price
pid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pieceprice = #{pieceprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dealer_unitprice = #{dealerUnitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dealer_pieceprice = #{dealerPieceprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
retail_unitprice = #{retailUnitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
